The photographer: Abdul Latif, confirmed that he did not use an electron microscope to capture the photo of the ant. He stated that he used a mirrorless camera with an additional lens to achieve the desired magnification.
A reverse image search on Google found t: s Instagram account in January 2018. This confirms that the image predates the misleading Facebook post.
The Merriam: Webster dictionary definition of macrophotography supports Abdul Latif's claim that the photo is a result of macrophotography techniques, rather than being taken under an electron microscope.
The expert: s investigation found multiple instances of the same photo being shared on Facebook and Twitter with similar misleading claims. This suggests that the misleading claim was spread across different platforms, further questioning its authenticity.
